name: v0.5.5
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6 or greater

1. (Bazel 6 only) Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "tar.bzl", version = "0.5.5")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE.bazel` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "tar.bzl",
    sha256 = "b025c3bab92066c23d070795b0e5de9c5d339c1953d5ed98aa686e89b914866d",
    strip_prefix = "tar.bzl-0.5.5",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/tar.bzl/releases/download/v0.5.5/tar.bzl-v0.5.5.tar.gz",
)
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

######################
# tar.bzl setup #
######################
http_archive(
    name = "bazel_skylib",
    sha256 = "bc283cdfcd526a52c3201279cda4bc298652efa898b10b4db0837dc51652756f",
    urls = [
        "https://github.com/bazelbuild/bazel-skylib/releases/download/1.7.1/bazel-skylib-1.7.1.tar.gz",
        "https://mirror.bazel.build/github.com/bazelbuild/bazel-skylib/releases/download/1.7.1/bazel-skylib-1.7.1.tar.gz",
    ],
)

http_archive(
    name = "aspect_bazel_lib",
    sha256 = "2be8a5df0b20b0ed37604b050da01dbf7ad45ad44768c0d478b64779b9f58412",
    strip_prefix = "bazel-lib-2.15.3",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/releases/download/v2.15.3/bazel-lib-v2.15.3.tar.gz",
)

load("@aspect_bazel_lib//lib:repositories.bzl", "aspect_bazel_lib_dependencies", "aspect_bazel_lib_register_toolchains")

# Required bazel-lib dependencies

aspect_bazel_lib_dependencies()

# Register bazel-lib toolchains

aspect_bazel_lib_register_toolchains()
```


## What's Changed
* fix: absolute label for toolchain type by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/tar.bzl/pull/53


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/tar.bzl/compare/v0.5.4...v0.5.5

name: v0.5.4
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6 or greater

1. (Bazel 6 only) Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "tar.bzl", version = "0.5.4")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE.bazel` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "tar.bzl",
    sha256 = "0a364de1fc46803ec6283b73d12af3be0201fd3e6a881ee069aedaff6624c4b4",
    strip_prefix = "tar.bzl-0.5.4",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/tar.bzl/releases/download/v0.5.4/tar.bzl-v0.5.4.tar.gz",
)
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

######################
# tar.bzl setup #
######################
http_archive(
    name = "bazel_skylib",
    sha256 = "bc283cdfcd526a52c3201279cda4bc298652efa898b10b4db0837dc51652756f",
    urls = [
        "https://github.com/bazelbuild/bazel-skylib/releases/download/1.7.1/bazel-skylib-1.7.1.tar.gz",
        "https://mirror.bazel.build/github.com/bazelbuild/bazel-skylib/releases/download/1.7.1/bazel-skylib-1.7.1.tar.gz",
    ],
)

http_archive(
    name = "aspect_bazel_lib",
    sha256 = "2be8a5df0b20b0ed37604b050da01dbf7ad45ad44768c0d478b64779b9f58412",
    strip_prefix = "bazel-lib-2.15.3",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/releases/download/v2.15.3/bazel-lib-v2.15.3.tar.gz",
)

load("@aspect_bazel_lib//lib:repositories.bzl", "aspect_bazel_lib_dependencies", "aspect_bazel_lib_register_toolchains")

# Required bazel-lib dependencies

aspect_bazel_lib_dependencies()

# Register bazel-lib toolchains

aspect_bazel_lib_register_toolchains()
```


## What's Changed
* Add compressor/compressor_args attributes by @gfrankliu in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/tar.bzl/pull/45
* Fix red CI due to ftp.gnu.org by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/tar.bzl/pull/47
* assert_tars_match: support pre-sorting the listings by @novas0x2a in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/tar.bzl/pull/48
* fix: add example of compression by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/tar.bzl/pull/50

## New Contributors
* @novas0x2a made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/tar.bzl/pull/48

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/tar.bzl/compare/v0.5.2...v0.5.4

## What's Changed

* chore: indicate primary download through scarf.sh by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/tar.bzl/pull/38
* fix: don't use version 0.0.0 by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/tar.bzl/pull/36


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/tar.bzl/compare/v0.4.0...v0.5.0

name: v0.4.0
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6 or greater

1. (Bazel 6 only) Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "tar.bzl", version = "0.4.0")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE.bazel` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "tar.bzl",
    sha256 = "9f0c915944f7eb422418b5c1f8361d15068a42dc566c5f2b74957a3d4f08a546",
    strip_prefix = "tar.bzl-0.4.0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/tar.bzl/releases/download/v0.4.0/tar.bzl-v0.4.0.tar.gz",

######################
# tar.bzl setup #
######################
http_archive(
    name = "bazel_skylib",
    sha256 = "bc283cdfcd526a52c3201279cda4bc298652efa898b10b4db0837dc51652756f",
    urls = [
        "https://github.com/bazelbuild/bazel-skylib/releases/download/1.7.1/bazel-skylib-1.7.1.tar.gz",
        "https://mirror.bazel.build/github.com/bazelbuild/bazel-skylib/releases/download/1.7.1/bazel-skylib-1.7.1.tar.gz",
    ],
)

http_archive(
    name = "aspect_bazel_lib",
    sha256 = "2be8a5df0b20b0ed37604b050da01dbf7ad45ad44768c0d478b64779b9f58412",
    strip_prefix = "bazel-lib-2.15.3",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/releases/download/v2.15.3/bazel-lib-v2.15.3.tar.gz",
)

load("@aspect_bazel_lib//lib:repositories.bzl", "aspect_bazel_lib_dependencies", "aspect_bazel_lib_register_toolchains")

# Required bazel-lib dependencies

aspect_bazel_lib_dependencies()

# Register bazel-lib toolchains

aspect_bazel_lib_register_toolchains()
```


## What's Changed
* chore: add missing matrix to AW by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/tar.bzl/pull/29
* chore: adopt bazelrc-presets by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/tar.bzl/pull/30
* chore: upgrade to Bazel 8 by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/tar.bzl/pull/32
* Include runfiles symlinks and root_symlinks by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/tar.bzl/pull/22
* chore: test on Bazel 9, stop testing on Bazel 6 by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/tar.bzl/pull/35
* fix: verify our bzl_library deps by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/tar.bzl/pull/31
* feat(mtree_mutate): use hermetic gawk by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/tar.bzl/pull/19


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/tar.bzl/compare/v0.3.3...v0.4.0

2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6 or greater

1. (Bazel 6 only) Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "tar.bzl", version = "0.3.0")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE.bazel` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "tar.bzl",
    sha256 = "5a50cca492e849d5074ae0a9025f753e1ee81c20c7a45882ccf99ed8d5f56939",
    strip_prefix = "tar.bzl-0.3.0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/tar.bzl/releases/download/v0.3.0/tar.bzl-v0.3.0.tar.gz",
)
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

######################
# tar.bzl setup #
######################
http_archive(
    name = "bazel_skylib",
    sha256 = "bc283cdfcd526a52c3201279cda4bc298652efa898b10b4db0837dc51652756f",
    urls = [
        "https://github.com/bazelbuild/bazel-skylib/releases/download/1.7.1/bazel-skylib-1.7.1.tar.gz",
        "https://mirror.bazel.build/github.com/bazelbuild/bazel-skylib/releases/download/1.7.1/bazel-skylib-1.7.1.tar.gz",
    ],
)

http_archive(
    name = "aspect_bazel_lib",
    sha256 = "2be8a5df0b20b0ed37604b050da01dbf7ad45ad44768c0d478b64779b9f58412",
    strip_prefix = "bazel-lib-2.15.3",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/releases/download/v2.15.3/bazel-lib-v2.15.3.tar.gz",
)

load("@aspect_bazel_lib//lib:repositories.bzl", "aspect_bazel_lib_dependencies", "aspect_bazel_lib_register_toolchains")

# Required bazel-lib dependencies

aspect_bazel_lib_dependencies()

# Register bazel-lib toolchains

aspect_bazel_lib_register_toolchains()
```


## What's Changed
* feat: syntax sugar for mutations by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/tar.bzl/pull/4
* fix: add a WORKSPACE file by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/tar.bzl/pull/2


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/tar.bzl/compare/v0.2.1...v0.3.0

## Using WORKSPACE
